resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

pitrou commented on a change in pull request #3046: ARROW-2624: [Python] Random schema generator for Arrow conversion and Parquet testing
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3046#discussion_r237552261
 
 

 ##########
 File path: python/pyarrow/tests/test_types.py
 ##########
 @@ -533,3 +536,38 @@ def test_schema_from_pandas(data):
     schema = pa.Schema.from_pandas(df)
     expected = pa.Table.from_pandas(df).schema
     assert schema == expected
+
+
+@h.given(
+    past.all_types |
+    past.all_fields |
+    past.all_schemas
+)
+@h.example(
+    pa.field(name='', type=pa.null(), metadata={'0': '', '': ''})
+)
+def test_pickling(field):
+    data = pickle.dumps(field)
+    assert pickle.loads(data) == field
+
+
+@h.given(
+    st.lists(past.all_types) |
+    st.lists(past.all_fields) |
+    st.lists(past.all_schemas)
+)
+def test_hashing(items):
+    h.assume(
 
 Review comment:
   What does "assume" do here? Skip if the condition is false? This may reduce the number of samples tested, no?

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/2067

Being able to generate random complex schemas and corresponding example data sets will help with exercising edge cases in many different parts of the codebase. One practical example: reading and writing nested data to Parquet format
fields.summary: [Python] Random schema and data generator for Arrow conversion and Parquet testing

comments.body:
The ASV benchmark suite has some support to generate random data for some types, but not random schema.
(see the {{BuiltinsGenerator}} in {{python/benchmarks/common.py}})
